description: Shelly’s family moved to Britain in the 1960’s and with them they brought a genuine energy and aptitude for Bangladeshi cooking. This, combined with her dad owning and running a Bangladeshi eatery in the 1970’s, gave her a profound comprehension of the varieties in Bangladeshi cooking. After some time Shelly figured out how to duplicate and ad lib on zest mixes and utilize cooking strategies embraced from her nation of origin, Britain.
